name: Escape The Forest (jmajo001)
description:
Escape The Forest is a platform game. A short proof of concept, that allows the player to use spell commands change the game world around them.

Guide the Android Magician out of the forest. Use their spells to change the state of the forest.

Controls:

WASD - Move

Mouse - Move Camera

Spacebar - Jump

Spell Commands are revealed through prompts in game.
